meta.about: We are a group of life drawing lovers. Targeting small eateries and restaurants all over Hong Kong, we will organise regular drawing opportunities for members to sketch out their favourite moments. All who appreciate art are welcome.
飢餓畫家 We organise food sketching events every month, join us on Facebook! 我們每月有餐廳寫生活動，歡迎留言報名。#cravingsketchers #飢餓畫家
